summary:
This is a nude patch for Omega99jp\'s AngeLydia -Lydia is reborn- 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26112
Omega stated that he or she wouldn\'t make one so here it is since I know a lot of you will want it.
There are also Apachii Hair patches for both the original mouth and the shut mouth versions of the mod.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/26183-2-1351617563.jpg[/img]
This is a nude patch for Omega99jp\'s AngeLydia -Lydia is reborn- 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26112
Omega stated that he or she wouldn\'t make one so here it is since I know a lot of you will want it.

I replaced the files 
data\\meshes\\actors\\Lydia\\femalebody_0.nif
data\\meshes\\actors\\Lydia\\femalebody_1.nif

I used Dimon99\'s UNP BASE Main body V1dot2-6709 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709
and I changed the texture path\'s in Nifskope to reference Omega99jp\'s Lydia body textures.

Credits
Omega99jp
Dimon99
_________________________________________________________________________________________

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/26183-1-1351612356.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/26183-2-1351612356.jpg[/img]
There are Apachii Hair patches for both original mouth and shut mouth.  The shut mouth version includes Omega99jp\'s Mouth Shutter patch.

you have to install ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v_1_0 under optional files from here : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
\" ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v_1_0
Standalone 10 New Female hairs - Not included in ApachiiSkyHair v_1_4_Full \" 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/download/76734
the esp for these patches need the apachiihairfemales.esm (it\'s a master even though it isn\'t showing up as one in NMM) , otherwise you get a ctd when launching.
The required ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v_1_0 file is not a female only version of Apachii Hairs. It is a standalone update that adds an additional 10 female hairs that are not included in the main version. Apachii intended for you to use both. The hair I chose is not available in the main version.

I replaced the files 
Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\facegendata\\facegeom\\skyrim.esm\\000a2c8e.nif and 
Data\\HousecarlWhiterun.esp

I used TES5Edit to change the hair in the HousecarlWhiterun.esp and to make apachiihairfemales.esm it\'s master, and I use NPC Editor to generate a new 000a2c8e.nif with the new hair.

Here\'s a more in-depth tutorial on how to make your own hair patch.
With Tes5Edit you need to select the HousecarlWhiterun.esp, right-click on add master, choose whatever hair.esm/p you\'re pulling a hair from.  
Then looking in that hair.esm/p find out the name\"name\"referenceID info for the replacer hair.  Input that info into the hair part section of the HousecarlWhiterun.esp. 
Exit Tes5Edit saving the HousecarlWhiterun.esp. 
Then open the HousecarlWhiterun.esp with NPC Editor change only the hair to the replacer hair of your choice.  
Save this, no bsa, choose loose files.  Do not overwrite the HousecarlWhiterun.esp you opened, save in a different location.  
Look in the files that NPC Editor made, pull out the 000a2c8e.nif file from the meshes.  Throw away the rest.  
Make a folder set up for the HousecarlWhiterun.esp, the one you made in Tes5Edit, and the 000a2c8e.nif file you made with NPC Editor.  
YourPatch\\Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\facegendata\\facegeom\\skyrim.esm\\000a2c8e.nif 
YourPatch\\Data\\HousecarlWhiterun.esp
Rar it up and install with NMM.

Credits
Omega99jp

Installation for any of the patches:
First you must have Omega99jp\'s mod installed already.
Second, install this mod with NMM when it asks to overwrite files say yes.

My companion mods:	
Dova s Angels - Iona - Jordis - Lydia - Mjoll - Saadia - Sylgja - Uthgerd
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/12885-1-1348036081.jpg[/img]
Dova s Orcs Borgakh - Ugor - Urog - Lash
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/12885-2-1348036081.jpg[/img]
Dova s Aerin
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/12885-3-1348036081.jpg[/img]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12885/
author: Omega99jp - Gambit77
